description: Represents an alert event raised by a policy.

alertDefinition.description: The name of the alert definition that triggered the alert event.
alertDefinition.title: alertDefinition

alertDefinitionNamespace.description: The namespace of the alert definition.
alertDefinitionNamespace.title: alertDefinitionNamespace

provider.description: The provider used that the alert came from.
provider.title: provider

timestamp.description: When the alert event was raised.
timestamp.title: timestamp

title: AlertEvent
